title: OPI Nail Polish 2012 Nicki Minaj Collection Color Pink Friday N16 0.5oz 15ml
description: OPI is renowned globally for its Nail Lacquers - a brilliant, chip-resistant, professional formula available in over 200 fashion-forward colors. With clever names that customers look forward to with each new Collection, OPI Nail Lacquers are beloved around the world, and trusted by professionals. Neither OPI Nail Lacquers nor any other OPI product or service is subject to animal testing.

title: NARS Shimmer Nail Polish, Orgasm
description: An exclusive formula with technology designed to improve flexibility, durability, wear and gloss properties. This longwearing formula provides a tough, durable chip-resistant finish and also has added UV protection to prevent polish discoloration.

title: OPI Katy Perry Collection Teenage Dream, 0.5 Fluid Ounce
description: Spring/Summer 2011 Katy Perry Collection. Dazzling, colorful & totally unique.

title: Opi Nail Polish Black Spotted M39 Rare! Hard to Find
